english_example_sentence: You can agree on a common point in this complex project.
russian_example_sentence: Вы можете договориться о компромиссе в этом сложном проекте.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu karmaşık projede ortak bir noktada anlaşabilirsiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, bu karmaşık projede ortak bir noktada ______.
